name: Lumberjack Challenge
description:
Take a break in the woods!

Are you into tree cutting games? Then meet our lumber simulator about realistic tree felling & logging.

Your aim in this game is simple: save money to improve the sawmill & build your logging empire!

Chop trees at any angle, knock them over, put them into trucks, and try not to destroy anything. Build homes, houses and upgrade your lumberjack tools!

The forests are calling. Enjoy tree cutting with our relaxation games!
